EmailTemplate.name: EOI/CA Refund Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Refund amount for {!Opportunity.EOI_CA__c} has been processed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The refund for '{!Opportunity.EOI_CA__c}' {!Opportunity.EOI_CA_Number__c} of 'customer' for '{!Opportunity.Project__c}' has been processed and is ready for payment.
Please click on the link for more details: {!Opportunity.Link}
Regards, Dynamix Group
